cause.description:
this cause wants to help clean the streets of north america. Kids are dying from gun play, and what do the cops do, nothing, people go hungry, and what do they do, sell drugs, why, cause the government wont treat them like humans, and help them get a job. people in the projects go homeless, because taxes are to high for their low-income. they need leaders, and we need to be them, help out and make a difference.
1. stop gun violence
2. help feed the people
3. better education
cause.mission: to help poverty be washed away from the streets
cause.name: Clean the streets
